author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Step to include the new HD scintillator in the V19 setup of HGCal

#### PR validation:

All earlier versions are tested with runTheMatrix

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx359H Step to include the new HD scintillator in the V19 setup of HGCal
